title: Unable to connect to the login queue ...?
body:
Never had this before, I can not login. I play on EUW.

''Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here, if it looks good follow the guide here''.

Anyone else having this?

replies.body: Hey... So this was me. I'm sorry. :( The issue should be fixed and clearing soon. I was making a change and messed up, fixed it, forgot to hit save and built a bit of a thundering herd situation. Sorry again! :(
I'm on EUW and it's not working yet
Still down over an hour now.. NA got fixed in no time why is it taking so long for everyone els?
Is that many people has this issue ?
Does all players got this kind of issue ???
i'm on NA and still it doesn't work at all!!!!!!!!!!{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Is that many people has this issue or only me??
Still can't log in. I'm located physically in the UK but am trying to log into the NA server. Been like this for a while now - any updates on a fix? :)

Just download yesterday, and it works yesterday.
But today I cant login. I play on NA.
''Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here, if it looks good follow the guide here''.
How can I solve this problem?
I'm having the same problem. Trying to log into NA server in vain...
I am also having the same problems, i am unabled to enter the login server!!
I have a limited daily gaming window.. and then not being able to play is really really annoying!

Hey Skelenth, working to consolidate threads to make it easier to talk to everyone: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/WEK0auGA-unable-to-connect-to-the-login-queue just posted an update here.
